import{getWeb3}from'utils/web3';import ifoV1Abi from'config/abi/ifoV1.json';import ifoV2Abi from'config/abi/ifoV2.json';import pointCenterIfo from'config/abi/pointCenterIfo.json';// Addresses
import claimRefundAbi from'config/abi/claimRefund.json';import profileABI from'config/abi/pancakeProfile.json';import erc721Abi from'config/abi/erc721.json';import bunnyFactoryAbi from'config/abi/bunnyFactory.json';import{getBunnyFactoryAddress,getClaimRefundAddress,getPancakeProfileAddress,getPointCenterIfoAddress}from'utils/addressHelpers';var getContract=function getContract(abi,address,web3){var _web3=web3!==null&&web3!==void 0?web3:getWeb3();return new _web3.eth.Contract(abi,address);};export var getIfoV1Contract=function getIfoV1Contract(address,web3){return getContract(ifoV1Abi,address,web3);};export var getIfoV2Contract=function getIfoV2Contract(address,web3){return getContract(ifoV2Abi,address,web3);};export var getPointCenterIfoContract=function getPointCenterIfoContract(web3){return getContract(pointCenterIfo,getPointCenterIfoAddress(),web3);};export var getClaimRefundContract=function getClaimRefundContract(web3){return getContract(claimRefundAbi,getClaimRefundAddress(),web3);};export var getProfileContract=function getProfileContract(web3){return getContract(profileABI,getPancakeProfileAddress(),web3);};export var getErc721Contract=function getErc721Contract(address,web3){return getContract(erc721Abi,address,web3);};export var getBunnyFactoryContract=function getBunnyFactoryContract(web3){return getContract(bunnyFactoryAbi,getBunnyFactoryAddress(),web3);};
